312 Steven Crowder
:
Keep in mind, 600K Chinese students means:

- 600K potential spies
- Inflated tuition
- Decreased opportunities for American students
- Training our primary geopolitical threat in fields most crucial to our national security posted 19 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 19 comments award share report block Steven Crowder @scrowder • 24h Keep in mind, 600K Chinese students means: - 600K potential spies - Inflated tuition - Decreased opportunities for American students - Training our primary geopolitical threat in fields most crucial to our national security Brilliant. Disclose.tv @disclosetv • 3M NOW - Trump says he'll allow 600,000 Chinese students into the U.S.
